settings.title: They're here!
settings.text:
We’re excited to announce the launch of our brand new Shed collection, designed to cater to all your garden storage and outdoor living needs. Whether you're a passionate gardener, a DIY enthusiast, or someone looking to create a unique space in your backyard, our diverse range of sheds has something for everyone.

Crafted from high-quality materials and built for long-lasting durability, each shed combines functionality with timeless design. Discover the latest in shed innovation with our Potting Sheds, Security Sheds, Corner Shed, Pub Shed, and Bike Shed.

settings.title: Apex Potting Shed
settings.text: Our Potting Shed with an Apex Roof brings a classic look to your garden with its steep pitch, which also provides extra vertical space for storage and shelving. The traditional roofline allows for better water runoff, protecting your gardening supplies from the elements.

settings.title: Pent Potting Shed
settings.text: The Pent Roof version offers a modern, streamlined look with a single sloping roof, ideal for contemporary gardens. Its design ensures effective water runoff while providing a sleek, space-saving profile that fits neatly along fences or walls.

settings.title: A Shed for Every Purpose
settings.description: Each shed in our new collection is thoughtfully designed to serve a specific purpose, providing you with versatile solutions that meet your needs, while enhancing your outdoor space. Whether you're looking to create a secure storage area, a hobbyist’s retreat, or even an outdoor entertaining spot, our sheds deliver both form and function.

settings.title: Bike Shed
settings.text: Keep your bicycles organised and secure with our custom-designed Bike Shed. Offering easy access and efficient storage, it’s a perfect solution for cycling enthusiasts who want to protect their bikes from the elements.

settings.title: Pub Shed
settings.text: Transform your garden into an outdoor oasis with our Pub Shed, designed to be the perfect space for entertaining friends and family. With room for bar counters, seating, and storage for drinks, it’s a great way to add character and a social hub to your outdoor living area.

settings.title: Why Choose our Sheds?
settings.text:
All of our sheds are made using premium-grade treated Shiplap T&G, ensuring long-lasting durability, resistance to the elements, and low maintenance. Whether you choose a potting shed, security shed, or pub shed, you can count on superior craftsmanship and a robust structure that will serve you for years to come. Our sheds are designed to be both practical and aesthetically pleasing, blending seamlessly into any garden or outdoor area.

Customisation and Sizing Options

At Ruby, we know that every garden and outdoor space is unique. That’s why we offer a range of sizes and customisation options to ensure that your shed perfectly fits your space and needs. Whether you need extra storage shelves, windows for additional light, or reinforced security features, we can tailor your shed to your exact specifications.

settings.title: Premium Quality Materials
settings.answer: Our sheds are built to last, made from high-quality Shiplap T&G, which is thoroughly pressure-treated with green tanalisation treatment for weather protection. Featuring 45mm x 33mm bracing, our sheds are built to last.

settings.title: Innovative Design
settings.answer: Each shed in our collection is designed with functionality and style in mind, providing the perfect solution for a range of needs.

settings.title: Customisation
settings.answer: Choose from a variety of sizes, roof designs, and features to suit your specific needs and preferences.

settings.title: Easy Installation
settings.answer:
Our sheds arrive with detailed step-by-step instructions, so are perfect for DIY enthusiasts and professional fitters.

However, we also offer installation services for those who would like the full package! Contact our Sales team on sales@ruby-group.co.uk or 01409 231763.

settings.testimonial: Our 8x8 pent premium is very well made and my wife and myself took a day to put it together. Everything went together quite easily and I would recommend Ruby sheds.
settings.author: Keith Hubbard

settings.testimonial: Quality built product for a reasonable price. Good galvanised fittings and screws which should last the life of the shed. Everything fitted together very well with no warping in the timber. Once the shed was unloaded from the van it only took my wife and I three hours to put up the shed and lay the roof.
settings.author: Mike Delamore
